mapper.select: SELECT e.event_name, e.event_image, s.schedule_time, s.schedule_name, r.reserved_count, r.reservation_status, r.reservation_date, p.total_price FROM reservation r JOIN event e on e.event_id = r.event_id JOIN event_part s on s.schedule_id = r.schedule_id JOIN payment p on p.payment_id = r.payment_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.reservation_date DESC

SELECT e.event_name, s.schedule_name, s.schedule_time, t.person_type, st.seat_name, t.ticket_type FROM ticket t JOIN reservation r ON r.reservation_id = t.reservation_id JOIN event e ON e.event_id = r.event_id JOIN event_part s ON s.schedule_id = r.schedule_id LEFT JOIN seat_type st ON st.seat_id = t.seat_id WHERE t.reservation_id = #{reservationId}
